REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0091 reute w f BC-THERMWOOD-<THM>-TRADE 03-12 0041

TEXT.TITLE: THERMWOOD <THM> TRADES ON PACIFIC EXCHANGE
TEXT.BODY: Thermwood Corp said its common stock has begun trading on the Pacific Stock Exchange under the symbol "THM." In February, its stock began trading on the Boston Stock Exchange. Reuter
